mapper.select: select * from waggle order by auto desc limit 10 offset #{page}
mapper.insert: insert into waggle(content, writer, name, day, reply) values(#{waggle}, #{id}, #{name}, now(), 0)
insert into wagglereply(id, name, reply, day, num) values(#{id}, #{name}, #{reply}, now(), #{num})
mapper.select: select * from wagglereply order by auto desc
select * from waggle order by auto desc
mapper.update: update waggle set reply = reply+1 where auto = #{num}
